title: Champions
body:
Riot if you do decide to read this post, please consider fixing a few champions like Veigar {{champion:45}} i don't think many players enjoy being one shotted by him, it's just rage educing. so far i do not know any champ that can counter him, and this might seem rather cheesy but i know some ranked players who don't deserve to be in bronze but a hard stuck... is there anyway that they could  try their promos again without the hassle? like if they have 15 out of 20 good games they have a shot at getting fully out of bronze. sincerely - AceFunHouse 
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

replies.body:
veigars major weaknesses involve range and the reasonably high cooldown on his combo and his reliance on landing his cage for him to full combo. In lane Veigar can get really punished by mages that outrange him (think vlekoz, xerath, syndra, zoe, annivia, ziggs) or get outplayed by champions with invulnerability or high mobility mechanics (Fizz, Kassadin, Leblanc, Vlad, Zilean, Zed). He also typically is rather slow at roaming and he aims to scale into midgame teamfights (free ap from stacks is actually most impactful during midgame), meaning his roams are easily either matched or countered by vision control.

Veigar ult's damage is also very dependant on missing hp, meaning his 'desperate' combo is literally just q+ult, which requires alot of ap and is mainly used against squishies and gets shut down hard by banshees. Similarly banshees veil can save you from getting caught and combo'd by veigars full e-w-q-r 'DIE' combo.

and if all else fails, you can always ban him, your team has 5 bans. Veigar isn't really overpowered but more niche frustrating, and again, Banshees, Edge of Night, Zhonias, ect... ways to negate his rotation or cc, go along way in making veigar's combo managable, and veigar is very vulnerable to being outranged since he has no sustain or mobility tools and his range is middling compared to other mages.
I'll be surer to keep this in mind thanks
